text:
A clientâ€™s graphql dynamically powered page is not returning results. It has been working for months and now (with no changes on our end) appears to be broken

Have there been any changes potentially affecting live sites?

Hi, we did have an issue earlier today for a short while that would have affected pages that were not prerendered. Is the issue ongoing? If so, can you send me one of the broken URLs so I can investigate further?

Anyone run into issues with properties that have a trailing underscore_?_ A query works in Graphiql with a filter `publish_to_website___eq: true` (note the total of 3 underscores), but not with `crm_objects()` or `crm_associations()`  as `"publish_to_website___eq=true"`
graphql and crm_objects and crm_associations don't use the same filter engine (don't know what the actual name for it is)
My comparison with graphql is really just the sanity check that I have my property name correct
